    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Položaj in premik</string>
            <string language="en">Position and Displacement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Position und Distanzadresse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Position et déplacement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Posição e deslocamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Posizione e spostamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέση και μετατόπιση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Posición y dislocación</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prikaz odvisnosti položaja in premika gleda na čas treh tovornjakov s konstantno hitrostijo.</string>
            <string language="en">Position/displacement dependence on time demonstrated with three trucks with constant speed.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">enakomerno gibanje</string>
            <string language="en">constant motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">položaj</string>
            <string language="en">position</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">premik</string>
            <string language="en">displacement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kinematika</string>
            <string language="en">kinematics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Position/displacement Abhängigkeit rechtzeitig 
zeigte mit drei LKWAS mit konstanter Geschwindigkeit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La dépendance de Position/displacement à 
l'heure a démontré avec trois camions avec la vitesse constante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A dependência de Position/displacement no tempo 
demonstrou com os três caminhões com velocidade constante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La dipendenza di Position/displacement da tempo 
ha dimostrato con tre camion con velocità costante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέση/εξάρτηση μετατοπίσεων που καταδεικνύεται 
εγκαίρως με τρία truck με τη σταθερή ταχύτητα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La dependencia de Position/displacement el tiempo
demostró con tres carros con velocidad constante.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
